name: SSF2
title: Site-Specific Factor 2
subtitle: Clark Level
notes:
**Note 1:**  Code the Clark level as documented in the pathology report.

**Note 2:**  Record only for squamous cell carcinoma of skin of eyelid.  
* For other histologies, use code 987, not applicable
rows:
Clark level I
In situ, intraepidermal, intraepithelial, noninvasive 
Basement membrane of epidermis is intact

Clark level II
Papillary dermis invaded

Clark level III
Papillary-reticular dermal interface invaded

Clark level IV
Reticular dermis invaded

Clark level V
Subcutaneous tissue invaded (through entire dermis)
Not applicable, not squamous cell carcinoma of skin of eyelid
Not applicable: Information not collected for this case
No histologic examination of primary site

Unknown or no information
Not documented in patient record
